com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.virtualization
Class Virtualization

java.lang.Object
  com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.virtualization.Virtualization

public class Virtualization
extends Object

The Virtualization class provides helpers to establish and dismantal System virtualizations. This includes providing mechanisms to associate and acquire appropriate VirtualizedSystem instances for given Threads and/or VirtualizedSystemClassLoaders.

Copyright (c) 2011. All Rights Reserved. Oracle Corporation.
Oracle is a registered trademark of Oracle Corporation and/or its affiliates.

Author:
Brian Oliver

          Obtains the VirtualizedSystem for the calling Thread or null if the Thread is not associated with a VirtualizedSystem.
static void start()
          Starts the virtualization of System resources through the use ClassLoader isolation of VirtualizedSystems.
static void stop()
          Stops the virtualization of System resources.

Constructor Detail

Virtualization

public Virtualization()
Method Detail

start

public static void start()
Starts the virtualization of System resources through the use ClassLoader isolation of VirtualizedSystems.

stop

public static void stop()
Stops the virtualization of System resources.

getVirtualizedSystem

public static VirtualizedSystem getVirtualizedSystem()
Obtains the VirtualizedSystem for the calling Thread or null if the Thread is not associated with a VirtualizedSystem.

Virtualization does not need to have started for this method to return the correct VirtualizedSystem.

Returns:
the VirtualizedSystem or null

getSystem

public static VirtualizedSystem getSystem()
Obtains the VirtualizedSystem for the calling Thread.

If the Thread is not being virtualized, the default VirtualizedSystem is returned. That is, unlike getVirtualizedSystem(), this method never returns null.

Returns:
a VirtualizedSystem

getPhysicalSystem

public static VirtualizedSystem getPhysicalSystem()
Obtains a VirtualizedSystem representation of the physical System.

Returns:
a VirtualizedSystem representation of the physical System

associateThreadWith

public static void associateThreadWith(VirtualizedSystem system)
Associates the specified VirtualizedSystem with the calling Thread (if not already associated).

Parameters:
system - the VirtualizedSystem for the calling Thread

dissociateThread

public static void dissociateThread()
Dissociates the VirtualizedSystem currently associated with the calling Thread.

After calling this method, the calling Thread will no longer be associated with it's VirtualizedSystem, except perhaps via its context ClassLoader.

getAvailablePorts

public static AvailablePortIterator getAvailablePorts()
Obtains the AvailablePortIterator for the Virtualization.

Returns:
the AvailablePortIterator
